mapper.select:
SELECT t.* ,t1.`qua_name` AS parentName FROM dic_qua t LEFT JOIN dic_qua t1 ON t.`parent_id` = t1.`id` and t1.`level` = 1 where t.`level` = 2
and t.parent_id = #{parentId}
and t.qua_name like CONCAT('%',#{quaName},'%')
order by t.create_time desc
select id as id ,qua_name as quaName from dic_qua where `level` = 1 order by order_no
select * from dic_qua where qua_name = #{quaName} AND `parent_id` is null
SELECT t.`qua_code` FROM dic_qua t WHERE t.`bench_name` = #{quaName} AND t.`level` != '1'
SELECT t.`qua_code` AS quaCode, t.`bench_name` AS benchName FROM dic_qua t WHERE t.`bench_name` IS NOT NULL AND t.`bench_name` = '工程设计建筑行业（建筑工程）'
SELECT ifnull(count(0),0) FROM biaodaa_admin.dic_qua d where d.parent_id=#{zid}

SELECT d.id, d.qua_name as quaName, d.bench_name AS benchName, d.qua_code AS quaCode, d.parent_id AS parentId FROM biaodaa_admin.dic_qua d WHERE 1=1
and d.bench_name like CONCAT('%',#{benchName},'%')
and d.id=#{zid}
order by order_no
SELECT d.id, d.qua_name AS quaName, d.qua_code AS quaCode FROM biaodaa_admin.dic_qua d WHERE d.level = '1' order by order_no
SELECT d.id, d.bench_name AS benchName, d.qua_code AS quaCode, d.qua_name as quaName FROM biaodaa_admin.dic_qua d WHERE d.level = #{noticeLevel} and d.parent_id=#{zzIdOne} order by order_no
SELECT bench_name AS benchName FROM biaodaa_admin.`dic_qua` WHERE bench_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{benchName}, '%')
SELECT biz_type as bizType FROM `dic_qua` WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT qua_code FROM `dic_qua` WHERE id = #{id}
select ifnull(count(1),0) from `dic_qua` WHERE bench_name = #{benchName}
select t.level from `dic_qua` t WHERE t.id = #{parentId} GROUP BY t.level
select ifnull(count(1),0) from `dic_qua` WHERE qua_name = #{quaName}
select qua_name from `dic_qua` WHERE id = #{quaId}
select t.id,t.parent_id as parentId,t.qua_name as quaName,t.level from `dic_qua` t where t.qua_name = #{quaMajor} and t.parent_id = #{pid}

select ifnull(count(1),0) from (SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL(t6.`bench_name`,''),IFNULL(t4.`name`,'')) AS quaLevel, CONCAT(IFNULL(t7.`name`,''),IFNULL(t3.`name`,'')) AS jointAilas, ifnull(t7.create_by,'system') AS createBy FROM `dic_alias` t3 JOIN `dic_common` t4 ON t3.`std_code` = t4.`code` RIGHT JOIN `rel_qua_grade` t5 ON t4.`code` = t5.`grade_code` RIGHT JOIN `dic_qua` t6 ON t5.`qua_code` = t6.`qua_code` JOIN `dic_alias` t7 ON t6.`qua_code` = t7.`std_code` WHERE 1=1 and t6.bench_name is not null ) qua where 1=1
and qua.quaLevel like CONCAT('%',#{benchName},'%')
and qua.jointAilas like CONCAT('%',#{qualAilas},'%')
and ${createBy}
select bench_name from `dic_qua` WHERE id = #{quaId}
select qua_code from `dic_qua` WHERE bench_name = #{benchName}
select bench_name from `dic_qua` WHERE qua_code = #{quaCode}

SELECT t.id, CONCAT(t.name, IFNULL(al.name,'')) AS jointAilas, i.name AS quaLevel, t.createBy FROM (SELECT a.name, r.grade_code, r.id, IFNULL(a.`create_by`,'system') AS createBy FROM dic_alias a LEFT JOIN rel_qua_grade r ON a.std_code = r.qua_code WHERE r.grade_code != '') AS t LEFT JOIN dic_alias al ON al.std_code = t.grade_code LEFT JOIN dic_qua_info i ON t.id = i.id WHERE 1=1 and t.name IS NOT NULL AND al.name IS NOT NULL
and i.name like CONCAT('%',#{benchName},'%')
and CONCAT(t.name, IFNULL(al.name,'')) like CONCAT('%',#{qualAilas},'%')
and (t.createBy = 'system' or t.createBy = '' or t.createBy = null)
and (not t.createBy = 'system' or not t.createBy = '' or not t.createBy = null)
ORDER BY t.name
order by t6.${rank}
LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}

SELECT ifnull(count(1),0) FROM (SELECT a.name, r.grade_code, r.id, IFNULL(a.`create_by`,'system') AS createBy FROM dic_alias a LEFT JOIN rel_qua_grade r ON a.std_code = r.qua_code WHERE r.grade_code != '') AS t LEFT JOIN dic_alias al ON al.std_code = t.grade_code LEFT JOIN dic_qua_info i ON t.id = i.id WHERE 1=1 and t.name IS NOT NULL AND al.name IS NOT NULL
and t.quaLevel like CONCAT('%',#{benchName},'%')
and CONCAT(t.name, IFNULL(al.name,'')) like CONCAT('%',#{qualAilas},'%')
and (t.createBy = 'system' or t.createBy = '' or t.createBy = null)
and (not t.createBy = 'system' or not t.createBy = '' or not t.createBy = null)

SELECT t5.`id`, t7.id as ailasId, t3.id as levelAilasId, CONCAT( IFNULL(t6.`bench_name`, ''), IFNULL(t4.`name`, '') ) AS quaLevel, CONCAT( IFNULL(t7.`name`, ''), IFNULL(t3.`name`, '') ) AS jointAilas, IFNULL(t7.create_by, 'system') AS createBy, t7.`create_time` AS createTime FROM `dic_alias` t3 JOIN `dic_common` t4 ON t3.`std_code` = t4.`code` JOIN `rel_qua_grade` t5 ON t4.`code` = t5.`grade_code` JOIN `dic_qua` t6 ON t5.`qua_code` = t6.`qua_code` JOIN `dic_alias` t7 ON t6.`qua_code` = t7.`std_code` WHERE 1 = 1 AND t6.`qua_code` = #{quaCode} AND t7.`name` = #{name}
SELECT d.id, d.qua_name AS quaName, d.qua_code AS quaCode FROM biaodaa_admin.dic_qua d WHERE d.level = '1' and (d.biz_type = '0' or d.biz_type = #{bizType}) order by order_no
SELECT d.id, d.bench_name AS benchName, d.qua_code AS quaCode FROM biaodaa_admin.dic_qua d WHERE d.level = #{noticeLevel} and d.parent_id=#{zzIdOne} and d.qua_name <> '地质灾害防治工程' order by order_no
